overview: When you visit the 'Gun Show', you'll get your fill of patriots, good ol’ boys, Second Amendment activists, and plenty of concealed weapons hidden deep inside camouflaged pants. With a ton of testosterone-filled studs who want to shoot things, you’re in for a wild ride complete with pumped up country boys wanting to unload their pistols with every gun-totin' stud they see. Steve Cruz directs this deliciously witty spoof of American firearm culture where the men are men, and their guns are cocked and loaded!
title: Gun Show
